cleaned_text: [](https://covidblog.oregon.gov/oregon-reaches-70-statewide-vaccination-goal/) On July 2, OHA announced that Oregon had officially reached the 70% statewide vaccination goal. "The 70% adult vaccination goal means we have a better chance to sustain a safe reopening," said OHA Director Patrick Allen. "The safe and effective COVID-19 vaccines continue to drive down new cases, hospitalizations and deaths in our state.
